name: S-27
description:
A pilot , Max Robinson has ran out of fuel and is barreling hopelessly through space in his ship. Hope is gained when the pilot spots a S-27 transport ship. He uses his ship's remaining fuel to dock onto the transport ship. Fight through the transport ship to get the fuel and escape the ship. In each room is a key. Get the key then get to the locked door to proceed to the next room.

Input:

WASD- Move

Aim With Mouse, LMB to shoot

E-Pickup

R-Reload

------------------------------------

Made in  4 days for Weekly Game Jam 129

Recommended to play in Fullscreen
